title: Apocalypse Truck
description: When the virus hit, cities crumbled, people vanished.  The world went silent except for the groans of the undead.  You’re one of the few survivors of zombie apocalypse.  Your only hope is a beat-up monster truck, with some spikes, plates, and just enough horsepower to push through the zombie chaos.
controls:
• Arrow keys / WASD: Drive and balance your truck
  • Mouse: Tap through menus or select levels
  • Mobile players can use touch buttons to control the truck.
controls_text:
Arrow keys / WASD: Drive and balance your truck
Mouse: Tap through menus or select levels
Mobile players can use touch buttons to control the truck.
howToPlay:
• Start by selecting the first level on the locked map. Levels unlock as you progress.
  • Your goal is to reach the finish line without losing all your health.
  • Use the arrow keys to accelerate and balance your truck on rough terrain. Jump the car using the up arrow or W key.
  • Zombies will be in your way; run them over for fun and coin rewards.
  • Perform front or back flips during big jumps to earn 3 bonus coins for each one.
  • If your truck lands upside down and stays flipped, your health bar drains fast. Don’t panic; press the up arrow and maneuver to flip back quickly!
  • Gather coins on the road. These coins let you unlock cooler and stronger trucks from the garage.
  • Replay levels to collect more coins and master your flips.
howToPlayText:
Start by selecting the first level on the locked map. Levels unlock as you progress.
Your goal is to reach the finish line without losing all your health.
Use the arrow keys to accelerate and balance your truck on rough terrain. Jump the car using the up arrow or W key.
Zombies will be in your way; run them over for fun and coin rewards.
Perform front or back flips during big jumps to earn 3 bonus coins for each one.
If your truck lands upside down and stays flipped, your health bar drains fast. Don’t panic; press the up arrow and maneuver to flip back quickly!
Gather coins on the road. These coins let you unlock cooler and stronger trucks from the garage.
Replay levels to collect more coins and master your flips.

title: Kick the Pirate
description: Ahoy matey!  Pirates may be brave on the high seas, but they’ve never met you.  In Kick the Pirate, your job is simple: turn this grumpy pirate into your personal punching bag.   He’s muttering curses or just standing there looking smug.
controls:
• Click or tap to attack the pirate.
  • Use earned coins to unlock more weapons.
  • Toggle settings in the top right for sound and blood effects.
controls_text:
Click or tap to attack the pirate.
Use earned coins to unlock more weapons.
Toggle settings in the top right for sound and blood effects.
howToPlay:
• Start by clicking or tapping the pirate as fast (or as furiously) as you like.
  • Each hit earns you coins, which you’ll use to buy new weapons.
  • Your goal is to deplete the pirate’s health bar ( at the bottom) to complete each level.
  • As you progress, the levels get tougher and the pirate gets sassier.
  • You can swap out the ship’s background if you want a change of scene. Click on the button on the bottom left corner to shop new backgrounds.
  • If you’d prefer less graphic visuals, use the drop icon in the corner to toggle off the blood splatter.
howToPlayText:
Start by clicking or tapping the pirate as fast (or as furiously) as you like.
Each hit earns you coins, which you’ll use to buy new weapons.
Your goal is to deplete the pirate’s health bar ( at the bottom) to complete each level.
As you progress, the levels get tougher and the pirate gets sassier.
You can swap out the ship’s background if you want a change of scene. Click on the button on the bottom left corner to shop new backgrounds.
If you’d prefer less graphic visuals, use the drop icon in the corner to toggle off the blood splatter.

title: Julie Beauty Salon
description: Julie Beauty Salon is a glam up makeover game where you run a beauty salon.  Every makeover is a mini masterpiece in this fun, stylish browser game.  You’re a beauty expert in charge of transforming a fabulous girl with bold makeup, trendy hairstyles, and colorful manicures.  If you've ever dreamed of being a stylist or just love mixing and matching beauty looks, this free game is perfect for you.

title: Mini Cars Racing
description: Mini Cars Racing is a 2 player car racing game you can play free on gamecorner.space!  You can race against the clock or battle a friend on the same device.  It's fast, fun, and feels just like playing with toy cars on your childhood road traffic rug.
controls:
Player 1

  • Accelerate: W
  • Brake: S
  • Left / Right: A / D
  • Respawn: C

Player 2

  • Accelerate: Up Arrow
  • Brake: Down Arrow
  • Left / Right: Left Arrow / Right Arrow
  • Respawn: Keypad 1

Player 1
Accelerate:
W

S

howToPlay:
• Pick Solo or Versus mode from the main menu.
  • Choose your car among 8 funky mini cars, each with a different color and shape. From mini trucks to sporty vans, find your signature mini car.
  • Select your race mode: Arcade or Time Trial.
  • Choose one of three cool tracks:
    • Bridge Madness: Full of wild jumps and narrow bridges.
    • Cactus County: Desert-themed track with sharp turns.
    • Rock Island: A rocky, cliffside challenge with scenic views and deadly drops.
  • Adjust your difficulty, then hit Start and race your way to the top!
  • Expect obstacles like traffic cones and floating ramps. And don't worry, if you fall off the map, you'll respawn. And if you get stuck in a corner, just hit the respawn key and dive back into the race.
howToPlayText:
Pick Solo or Versus mode from the main menu.
Choose your car among 8 funky mini cars, each with a different color and shape. From mini trucks to sporty vans, find your signature mini car.
Select your race mode: Arcade or Time Trial.
Choose one of three cool tracks:
Bridge Madness:
Full of wild jumps and narrow bridges.
Cactus County:
Desert-themed track with sharp turns.
Rock Island:
A rocky, cliffside challenge with scenic views and deadly drops.
Adjust your difficulty, then hit Start and race your way to the top!
Expect obstacles like traffic cones and floating ramps. And don't worry, if you fall off the map, you'll respawn. And if you get stuck in a corner, just hit the respawn key and dive back into the race.

title: Pyramid Solitaire
description: Pyramid Solitaire is a free online card game at gamecorner.space.  In this calming card puzzle, you need to remove a pyramid of cards by selecting pairs that add up to 13.  It's a simple but fun game to learn.
controls:
• Tap (or click) on a card to select it.
  • Click another card that totals 13 to clear the pair.
  • Click the deck at the bottom to draw a card when stuck.
controls_text:
Tap (or click) on a card to select it.
Click another card that totals 13 to clear the pair.
Click the deck at the bottom to draw a card when stuck.
howToPlay:
Begin at the top layers (cards at the bottom). Only uncovered cards can be matched. Match pairs to 13.

Kings are 13 by themselves, Queens are 12, Jacks are 11, and all number cards are at face value. You can match cards of any type of color. For example, 5 ♥ and 7♣.
howToPlayText:
Begin at the top layers (cards at the bottom). Only uncovered cards can be matched. Match pairs to 13.
Kings are 13 by themselves, Queens are 12, Jacks are 11, and all number cards are at face value. You can match cards of any type of color. For example, 5 ♥ and 7♣.

title: Solitaire
description: "Emma's afternoon hit a wall at exactly 3:17 PM.  Her inbox chimed again, another urgent task from her manager.  Minimized the spreadsheet and opened Solitaire on gamecorner.space.
controls:
• Click the stock pile (top left) to flip a new card.
  • Click or drag cards to move them between piles.
  • Double-click a card to send it to its foundation pile if it fits.
controls_text:
Click the stock pile (top left) to flip a new card.
Click or drag cards to move them between piles.
Double-click a card to send it to its foundation pile if it fits.
howToPlay:
• Look at the cards you can see on the table and in the flipped pile.
  • Move cards by clicking or dragging: you can only put a red card on a black card or a black on a red, and the numbers must go down by one (for example, put a red 5 on a black 6).
  • If you uncover an Ace, it 'll be automatically moved to one of the four empty spots at the top.
  • When you flip a card from the face-down deck, look if it fits on the table or on the foundations. If it fits, click or drag it there.
  • If you clear a whole column, only a King (or a King-led stack) can go into that empty spot.
  • Keep doing this: flip cards, move cards, and sort them into the top piles.
  • You win when all cards end up in the four piles, from Ace up to King. If you get stuck, click on the undo button to try a new approach or click on the new game to start fresh.

title: Drift King
description:
Drift King stands out among online drift games, offering a unique experience where you can witness the smoke you leave behind from the rearview window.  This game surrounds you in every realistic detail, from its premium 3D visuals to the choice of 10 sports cars and 6 maps. 
The comprehensive tuning options further enhance the game, making it a complete package for drifting enthusiasts. 


Controls

WASD or arrow keys: Move car 
M: Rearview Mirror
C: Change Carnera
R: Reset Car
U: Toggle between KMH and MPH
I: Start/Stop Engine
P: Fullscreen



howToPlay Drift King
The traditional approach in a car game would be to give zero cash to the player at the beginning.
controls:
• WASD or arrow keys: Move car 
  • M: Rearview Mirror
  • C: Change Carnera
  • R: Reset Car

howToPlay:
The traditional approach in a car game would be to give zero cash to the player at the beginning. This means waiting and playing for a long time to use any cool feature a game might offer. However, we told you Drift King is different. Here's a step-by-step guide to get you started.

  • Drift King puts 30,000 coins in your pocket, right as you enter the game. This allows you to buy most of the cars in the garage, upgrade the parts, and tune them as you like before you.
  • So, our suggestion is to first hang out in the garage a bit. Find the car you like the most, explore upgrades and tuning options. 
  • If you're not sure how to tune your car, find our complete guide on tuning. 
  • Then move on to maps. You have six options in the maps section. 
  • Select a map that will describe your drifting experience, your environment preferences, and what you expect from the game.
  • Some of maps have racetracks while some are long countryside roads with slight curves. It's up to you.
  • If you spawn onto the map, now aim for the longest drift. Keep the speed high and perform manji drifts and donuts. Or go freestyle and follow the curves of the road while leaving S-shaped marks behind you.

title: Love Tester
description: Do you want to know how much your crush falls for you?  Here is a way to test the love of the one and only.  Love Tester is an online game where you fill out your and your crush's names.  Then, let the tester do all the calculations about how much they love you, miss you during the day, or have any second thoughts about you.
howToPlay:
• Open Love Tester on OnlineGames.io. 
  • Enter your name and the name of the person whom you want to test the love of.
  • Hit the big heart at the center, and you will get the love calculator's compatibility results in seconds.

You will see your results in percentages and get an evaluation of the potential associated with the couples you entered.

Maybe the result will encourage you! About expressing your love… 😉

title: Highway Traffic
description:
Highway Traffic game is centered around driving down the highway, dodging other cars, and avoiding accidents.  It gets tricky because other vehicles are slowing down, speeding up or stopping abruptly, so you always have to keep your attention and be ready to make a quick maneuver.  
The longer you go without hitting other cars, the more points you collect and the more upgrades you can get.  Highway Traffic gets challenging very quickly, so you must build up crazy driving skills to reach higher levels!
controls:
• W or up arrow: accelerate
  • A/D, or left/right arrow: steer the car
  • Space bar: use handbrake
  • Left shift or F: use car boost

title: Fast Food Rush
description: You're at Burger King, sinking your teeth into a juicy cheeseburger and finishing it off in about 15 minutes flat.  But just this once, before you head out, pause and take a quick look around.  Employees are rushing nonstop, flipping sizzling patties, taking orders at the counter, pouring ice-cold drinks, and wiping down tables.  At this point, running your own burger joint might seem pretty appealing, at least to some people.
controls:
On Computers

  • Mouse Scroll: Zoom in or out

On Mobile

title: Masked Special Forces
description:
Masked Special Forces is a multiplayer first-person shooter game with a myriad of customization options.  The game puts you in the shoes of a commander in the battle arena.  As a talented warrior, team up, strategize, and take down the opponents one by one.  
Access to an array of upgradable weapons, armory, kill messages, and victory dances on the main menu.
controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse click to fire
  • Right mouse click to aim
  • Space to jump
  • Q to slide while running
  • Left shift to run
  • 1, 2, 3 (or scroll) to change weapon
  • E or F to interact/pick up a weapon
  • G to throw available dynamite
  • H to use available medkits
  • T to chat
  • L to toggle cursor lock
  • C to crouch
  • Hold Tab to show the scoreboard
  • Escape to pause
controls_text:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Left mouse click to fire
Right mouse click to aim
Space to jump
Q to slide while running
Left shift to run
1, 2, 3 (or scroll) to change weapon

G to throw available dynamite
H to use available medkits
T to chat
L to toggle cursor lock
C to crouch
Hold Tab to show the scoreboard
Escape to pause
howToPlay:
• You can begin the game by joining a room made by other players, or you can create one yourself. 
  • To do that, you must give a name to the room, choose the maximum players, game mode, round time, bot count and map.
  • After entering a room, the battle starts immediately. Take your position and start eliminating enemies.
  • Learn about how to aim and shoot, other controls, display, armory, and maps below.

title: Madalin Stunt Cars Pro
description:
Are you open to experiencing luxury?  The 3D driving game Madalin Stunt Cars Pro features excellent graphics for lifelike experiences.  You can choose from various vehicles in Madalin Stunt Cars Pro, from the most opulent sports cars to a police cruiser, in three distinct map areas.

Stickman Parkour is an online platformer game that you can play on your browser, embracing the easy-to-learn but hard-to-master mechanics.  Collect keys, open chests, pass levels and help him find his way out across 30 levels. 
What is Stickman Parkour about? 
Imagine Stickman, a tiny stick figure who decides one day to go on this epic adventure.

title: Escape Car
description: Do you remember the very first Grand Theft Auto?  That old-school, top-down chaos.  Think of that and give it a fresh coat of chunky 3D graphics.  Next, drop that straight in your browser.
controls:
• A or Left Arrow to steer left
  • D or Right Arrow to steer right.
controls_text:
A or Left Arrow to steer left
D or Right Arrow to steer right.
howToPlay:
• The moment you touch A or D, the police chase begins.
  • Drive as long as you possibly can without letting the cops box you in. Grab the cash piles on the road for extra money.
  • The BUSTED bar at the top fills with every bump; solid red means game over.
  • The longer you survive, the faster the score counter on the top left ticks.
  • Watch the stars next to your score; each new star means tougher cops and bigger points. First more cars show up, then heavy trucks, and later even tanks and helicopters.
  • When you finally bite the curb, your score instantly converts to money for upgrades. Unlock a new faster car from the garage and repeat. Hit restart and see if that next run tops your record.
howToPlayText:
The moment you touch A or D, the police chase begins.
Drive as long as you possibly can without letting the cops box you in. Grab the cash piles on the road for extra money.
The BUSTED bar at the top fills with every bump; solid red means game over.
The longer you survive, the faster the score counter on the top left ticks.
Watch the stars next to your score; each new star means tougher cops and bigger points. First more cars show up, then heavy trucks, and later even tanks and helicopters.
When you finally bite the curb, your score instantly converts to money for upgrades. Unlock a new faster car from the garage and repeat. Hit restart and see if that next run tops your record.

title: Drift Hunters Pro
description: Can you hear the engine moaning?  Drift Hunters Pro is a thrilling 3D game with high-quality graphics for those who are fond of drifting & racing.  You can play solely, or you can play on the servers with other players.  In this game, you have 6 different tracks and 10 upgradable vehicles in the garage that you can buy with earnings via drifting.
howToPlay:
• Use WASD or the Arrow keys to direct the vehicle
  • Use the Space key as the handbrake
  • Use C to change the camera view
  • Use R for resetting the vehicle
  • Use U to change KMH > MPH
  • Use I for starting or stopping the engine
  • Use P for Full Screen
howToPlayText:
Use WASD or the Arrow keys to direct the vehicle
Use the Space key as the handbrake
Use C to change the camera view
Use R for resetting the vehicle
Use U to change KMH > MPH
Use I for starting or stopping the engine
Use P for Full Screen

title: Five Nights at Poppy
description: Ever stayed late at school or walked through a dark hallway alone and felt like something was watching you?  Did you just hear the footsteps?  Is it the wind or someone whistling?  Now imagine that same creep, but at an abandoned mental hospital where animatronic Poppy from FNAF stays in.
controls:
• Left Click: Interact with lights, doors, and cameras
  • Click and Hold: Repair damaged camera feeds
controls_text:
Left Click:
Interact with lights, doors, and cameras
Click and Hold:
Repair damaged camera feeds
howToPlay:
You begin each night sitting in a small security office with monitors all around. Each screen shows different parts of the hospital—like patient rooms, hallways, and a morgue. Your main jobis to watch out for Poppy.

Poppy moves slowly at first and switches back and forth between rooms. But as the nights go by, she becomes faster, sneakier, and more aggressive. She's not just creepy but also smart. If your cameras stay broken too long or you waste power-flipping switches, she'll strike. Here's what to keep track of:

  • Cameras: If one goes fuzzy or shows static, press and hold for a while to repair it.
  • Power: You have limited energy. Leaving doors closed or lights on drains it fast.
  • Corridors: Watch the left and right doors near your office. If you see glowing eyes, close the door fast!

Each night gets harder. You'll need to react quicker as the game goes on. It's a game of multitasking. One mistake, and Poppy's in your face. And trust us, the jumpscares are no joke.

title: Stickman GTA City
description: You've been digging the internet for ages, looking for a free GTA game to play on your browser, only to end up with games that disappoint faster than a balloon losing air.  You might have given up hope, reminiscing about the days of cruising through GTA San Andreas or Vice City with your bro.  Think of how much you missed even hearing that iconic sound, the one that plays right as the screen fades to black with a bold "Wasted! " slapped across it?
controls:
Movement

  • W, A, S, D: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • LMB: Look Around
  • Shift: Sprint
  • C: Crouch
  • F: Enter or exit vehicles

Shooting / Attacking

  • Z: Aim
  • RMB or Ctrl: Shoot/Attack
  • R: Reload
  • 1-9 or Q key or Mouse Scroll: Switch Weapons
  • J, K, L Keys: Rocket Launcher, RDP and Barret

howToPlay:
• Start by picking a place to spawn on the GTA city map.
  • You'll begin with your first mission of evading the police and driving to the mafia escape house.
  • After completing the first mission, you're free to follow mafia missions or explore the city at your own pace. You can access main and side missions using Stickman's phone. Completing missions will bring lots of cash.  
  • Use your Stickman's skills to steal vehicles, take down enemies, and evade the cops. Collect money and weapons scattered across the city.
  • Check your Stickman's health level often. If health is zero, you need to start over!

Note: Remember there's no one-size-fits-all approach to playing open-world games. So, grab the controls, go out there and find your own way. Maybe you can tell us about your story in the comment section below.

Use your Stickman's skills to steal vehicles, take down enemies, and evade the cops. Collect money and weapons scattered across the city.
Check your Stickman's health level often. If health is zero, you need to start over!

title: Pixel Driver
description: Sometimes, you just crave something simple.  Nothing fancy.  No complicated missions or stressful tasks.  Just a pixel car, a colorful city, and the freedom to roam.
controls:

  • Use nitro with Shift
  • Pause or open menu with Escape

Use nitro with Shift
Pause or open menu with Escape

title: Get On Top
description: Remember those days when you and your brother used to wrestle for hours until one of you cried and complained to Mom?  It was a real duel, wasn't it?  You would flip over together like a human ball, with arms and legs flying in the air.  So, we've brought sibling wrestling to the virtual realm.
controls:
Computers

  • Left Player: A, D, W keys to control stickman
  • Right Player: Left, right and up arrows to control stickman

Mobile Devices

  • Use the relevant arrow buttons on the screen.
controls_text:
Computers
Left Player:
A, D, W keys to control stickman
Right Player:
Left, right and up arrows to control stickman
Mobile Devices
Use the relevant arrow buttons on the screen.
howToPlay:
• Two game modes to choose: 1 Player against AI and 2 players 
  • The goal is to take control of the ragdoll and make it jump over the opponent. 
  • You win the round if the opponent's head hits the ground.
  • Score a point in 11 rounds to be the winner of the game.

Two game modes to choose: 1 Player against AI and 2 players
The goal is to take control of the ragdoll and make it jump over the opponent.
You
win the round if the opponent's head hits the ground
.
Score a point in 11 rounds to be the winner of the game.

title: Basket Hoop
description: In Basket Hoop, gravity is your only challenge, and tapping is your sole weapon.  Your goal is simple make the ball jump and send it inside the hoop.  The charm of the one button games peaks in Basket Hoop online.  Make as many baskets as you can in a limited amount of time.
controls:
Computer:

Use your mouse to shoot the ball.

Mobile:

Tap to shoot the ball
controls_text:
Computer:
Use your mouse to shoot the ball.
Mobile:
Tap to shoot the ball
howToPlay:
• Tap or click on anywhere on the screen to dunk the ball.
  • You can jump the ball mid-air as well. Control the angle to land the ball in the hoop.
  • You have 5 seconds to make a score. If you miss a score within the time limit, the ball will return from the other side for another chance.
  • Each successful shot will create a new net in a different position for your next attempt.
  • Continue tapping to jump and shoot as many baskets as possible before the time runs out.
  • If you run out of time without scoring enough baskets, restart and aim to beat your personal best!

You can jump the ball mid-air as well. Control the angle to land the ball in the hoop.
You have 5 seconds to make a score. If you miss a score within the time limit, the ball will return from the other side for another chance.
Each successful shot will create a new net in a different position for your next attempt.
Continue tapping to jump and shoot as many baskets as possible before the time runs out.
If you run out of time without scoring enough baskets, restart and aim to beat your personal best!

title: Stickman Destruction
description: How many parts can you divide a virtual character into?  Stickman Destruction is an action-oriented stickman ragdoll game in which you tear the virtual character apart a million times.  The whole point of this game is to break the Stickman’s bones as much as possible by hitting him from right to left!  Use your creativity and strategically calculate how you can get the most points.
controls: Click on Start on the playing screen, hold it until it reaches a specific speed, and then release it. It will cause your Stickman to burst.
controls_text: Click on Start on the playing screen, hold it until it reaches a specific speed, and then release it. It will cause your Stickman to burst.
howToPlay: The whole purpose of Stickman Destruction is to increase the damage the character takes and gain points by creating as many obstacles as possible. You have 22 different map options, and every one of them has various obstacle alternatives. By earning points, you can get these map options and create a more dangerous environment.

You have 22 different map options, and every one of them has various obstacle alternatives. By earning points, you can get these map options and create a more dangerous environment.

title: Rooftop Duel
description: Can you handle a rooftop shoot-out with gravity, ragdoll limbs, and a toybox of overpowered weapons?  The recoil is wild here.  Rooftop Duel piles all the goofy physics of classic ragdoll games.  You'll try to knock off your opponent on a city rooftop.
controls:
Player 1

  • W / Right Mouse : Jump
  • Hold E / Left Mouse : Aim
  • Release E / Release Left-Mouse : Shoot

Player 2

  • I : Jump
  • Hold O : Aim
  • Release O : Shoot
controls_text:
Player 1
W / Right Mouse :
Jump
Hold E / Left Mouse :
Aim
Release E / Release Left-Mouse :
Shoot
Player 2
I : Jump
Hold O :
Aim
Release O :
Shoot
howToPlay:
Once the round loads, both ragdoll fighters try to balance on a rooftop. Tap jump, hold to aim, then let go to shoot. Every shot packs recoil, so a blast can rescue you from the edge or fling you into mid-air.

Floaty jumps give you a moment to dodge an incoming bullet, or if you mistime things, you'll sail straight into the abyss. If you stay up while your opponent falls, you win the round, collect coins, and head back to the shop for an even sillier weapon before the next rooftop showdown.

  • Peek into the garage to scope out each car's stats and upgrade potential. Need for speed? Seek a lightweight car like the Porsche 993. Prefer engine power on those hills? Monster Truck comes to the help. Or Would you like to master maneuvers on those tight turns? Then, stick with a car with extreme handling performance.

title: Police Chase Drifter
description:
Collect money and ride with speed while escaping the police cars.  Police Chase Drifter will give you the chance to  become a drifter champion driving through the obstacles of the city.  You will only get rid of the police cars by making them destroy themselves in the tight corners. 
Follow the arrows that will show you the way to the money.

title: Monster Truck Race Arena
description: Love giant wheels?  You’re in for a treat.  Rev your engines in Monster Truck Race Arena, a 2D racing game where flipping your truck is the fastest way to lose!  Drive through rough off-road tracks, pull off stunts, and race head-to-head with other monster trucks.
controls:
• Drive: Use WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Nitro: Press Spacebar
controls_text:
Drive:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys
Nitro:
Press Spacebar
howToPlay:
• You begin the game with a basic monster truck: yellow with red flames. It's your starter vehicle, and it’s just enough to get you through the early levels. The main goal is to complete each track without crashing and getting the ranking bonus. If your truck lands upside down at any point, the race ends immediately, and you’ll restart from the beginning of that level. During the race, a nitro bar at the top of the screen shows how much boost you have left. Timing your nitro at the right moment can make the difference between flying over an obstacle and crashing into it.
  • There are 24 levels to unlock, and you progress one at a time by finishing the current stage. Coins are scattered along the way and rewarded for successful races. These coins are crucial for your progress.
  • You can spend coins in two key ways:
    • Upgrade your truck’s engine power or nitro capacity, both for 100 coins each.
    • Unlock new trucks, each with unique designs. From classic styles to shark and sports-car hybrids, they range in price from 150 to 800 coins.
  • Before each race, you can enter the garage, view your truck, and upgrade performance to help clear tougher levels more easily.

title: Kick the Alien
description:
Kick the Alien is a wacky clicker game where an evil alien has just arrived to colonize your planet.  And your job is to give a sneaky alien the pounding it deserves. 
Every click you make sends the alien flying, earns you coins, and pushes you closer to the next level.  Use those coins to unlock wild weapons, new battlegrounds, and more.
controls: • Left Click: Hit the alien using your equipped weapon
controls_text:
Left Click:
Hit the alien using your equipped weapon
howToPlay:
Your goal is to defeat the alien by hitting it repeatedly until its health bar (at the bottom) runs out. Every time you strike, you earn coins. These coins add up fast, and once you’ve got enough, you can dive into the weapon shop and unlock stronger gear.

Click the weapon icons at the top to switch between tools like ray guns, hammers, and other sci-fi madness. Each weapon has a price, so choose wisely and save up!

When the alien’s health reaches zero, you move on to the next level and earn a coin bonus. The alien might get tougher, but so do your weapons, so keep upgrading!

title: Nova Clicker
description: Nova Clicker is an online idle game which starts you off with a single, smiley Nova, its name is FreezeNova.  A simple tap or click on FreezeNova produces your first handful of stars.  But don't be fooled, this clicker game quickly grows beyond basic tapping.  Soon, you'll be managing an entire universe of quirky characters and powerful upgrades, all designed to make you the ultimate star tycoon.
controls:
• On a Computer: Click on FreezeNova to earn stars.
  • On a Mobile Device: Tap the character to begin generating stars.

On a Computer:
Click on FreezeNova to earn stars.

Tap the character to begin generating stars.

title: Cookie Clicker Pro
description: Love cookies?  Want to create the biggest cookie empire the internet has ever seen?  Then Cookie Clicker Pro is exactly your game!  It's a simple, addictively fun incremental game, packed with sweet strategies.
controls: Use your mouse to play Cookie Clicker Pro.
controls_text: Use your mouse to play Cookie Clicker Pro.
howToPlay:
Click on the giant cookie. Every click adds fresh-baked cookies to your stash. You can track the number of your cookies at the top of your screen. You can also read the news ticker with jokes about the impact you created by baking.  

Once you've clicked enough, buy your first buildings to automate cookie-making. Start with buying cursors, and they will keep clicking for you. Next, employ some Grandmas, they bake slowly but steadily. When you progress enough with cursors and grandmas, you'll open factories, farms, and even cookie mines to pump out mountains of cookies every second.

Keep building and watch your cookie empire expand like crazy! Use your cookies to buy upgrades, doubling your baking pow(d)er. Upgrades turn your humble bakery into an unstoppable cookie-producing machine.

  • Use the Space key for Handbrake
  • Use Enter to reset the vehicle if it tilts over

  • Use Tab or Page Up / Page Down to select a vehicle
  • Use 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 to choose a specific vehicle
  • Use E to make the gray stone move for the load test
  • Use R for repairing the vehicle
  • Use T for opening or closing the slow-motion mode
  • Use P for pausing vehicles
  • Use Y for showing/hiding the Telemetry

title: Super Car Driving
description:
Super Car Driving is an online car game where you get to drive super-performing high-end models like Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche and more. 
This online driving game offers a full package with 3 game modes that can appeal to every taste.  Adrenaline seekers can enjoy completing stunt challenges while skill gamers maneuver their supercars in the lots of parking levels.  Meanwhile, free spirits can hit the road on a GTA ViceCity-like map and test their sports cars' performance.
controls:
• Drive: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Handbrake: Spacebar
  • Change Camera View: C
  • Look Back: B
controls_text:
Drive
: WASD or Arrow keys
Handbrake
: Spacebar
Change Camera View
: C
Look Back
: B
howToPlay:
• Choose a car among 13 supercars, pick a game mode and start driving.
  • Drive your car using WASD or arrow keys. Press space to pull handbrakes and initiaete drifts.
  • There are 4 epic camera modes you can pick among: first-person driver, cinematic rear wheel view, third person and top-down views. Press C to switch between views.
  • Complete tasks to rack up coins and buy more agile and dynamic-looking cars.
  • If you'd like, you can modify your car in the garage, add some texture to the coat, change the colors and lights, or even buy spoilers.

Complete tasks to rack up coins and buy more agile and dynamic-looking cars.
If you'd like, you can modify your car in the garage, add some texture to the coat, change the colors and lights, or even buy spoilers.

title: Farming Island
description:
If you’ve ever zoned out at work, dreaming about quitting everything and running your own farm on a sunny island… yeah, same.  Farming Island lets you do just that, without ever leaving the city or even your browser.  Farming Island Online is a relaxed, clicker-style farming game where you explore a peaceful island, plant crops, raise animals, fish a little, and stack up some digital coins. 
You start off with a nice little plot of land, a few thousand coins in your pocket, and no clue what you’re doing, but that’s part of the fun.
controls:
• Move by WASD or arrow keys
  • Left-click to plant, collect, and interact
  • You can also move your character by dragging your mouse
controls_text:
Move by WASD or arrow keys
Left-click to plant, collect, and interact
You can also move your character by dragging your mouse
howToPlay:
Your farming life kicks off with a modest patch of land and 2,500 coins. First things first, start exploring. Shake trees to get fruit (yep, it works), and keep an eye out for things you can collect. Use your coins to unlock nearby areas, upgrade the mill, and start expanding your island farm one section at a time.

Soon, you’ll have access to garden plots. Choose from crops like tomatoes, eggplants, and corn. Plant seeds, water them, and wait for your harvest. Or just hire some auto-farmers to do the hard work for you while you chill. These little guys are surprisingly efficient and will haul everything to your silo (a.k.a. your produce HQ). Don't forget to upgrade it when it starts overflowing.

Selling is a breeze. Just grab the goods from your silo and head over to the sellers. Each one buys different stuff, so if you’ve been hoarding fish but the seller only wants veggies…well, maybe go do some planting.

And yes, there are animals. Milk the cows, gather eggs, shear alpacas. The animals are cute, but more importantly, they’re money makers. Upgrading their pens means more products and faster production. No real animal chores, just fun.

Fishing is a whole side quest of its own. Cast your rod when you see a fish, wait for the green bar, then hold to catch. Let go too early or too late and that fish is gone. Timing matters!

title: Mafia Getaway Cars
description:
Mafia Getaway Cars is a 2D driving game where you’re driving, escaping, shooting, and occasionally flipping your 1930s mob-mobile over a suspiciously placed slope.  If you ever wondered what it’s like to be a vintage gangster on the run with terrible road planning and way too many enemies, this online game is your dream (or nightmare). 
Put on your best fedora, hop into your sketchy-looking getaway car, and floor it.  The cops are mad, the rival gangs are really mad, and gravity?
controls: WASD or arrow keys to drive.

title: Kingdom Battle 3D
description: If you're into free games that mix brainpower strategy with epic battle scenes, Kingdom Battle 3D might be your next obsession.  This isn’t just another button-masher.  You’re the commander here, calling the shots, building your army, and leading your troops into some seriously intense medieval battles.  Knights, mages, cavalry, and magic spells flying everywhere.
controls:
• WASD / Arrow keys: Move the camera around
  • Mouse: Place troops and interact
controls_text:
WASD / Arrow keys:
Move the camera around
Mouse:
Place troops and interact
howToPlay:
• You’ll start with Campaign Mode. This is where you fight level by level, unlocking new unit types and getting the hang of the game. After Level 6, things really open up. That’s when you get access to Training Mode, a chill place to mess around with unit setups, and Online PvP, where you’ll go head-to-head with other online players.
  • Before each battle, you get a top-down view of the battlefield. Take a second to scan the enemy’s formation. Use scroll to zoom in or out. Then, place your troops carefully. Frontliners up front. Archers and mages in the back. It’s all about balance and timing. Use your frontline units to soak up damage so your ranged units stay safe.
  • After victories, you'll earn silver that you'll use to upgrade your troops. Don’t throw all your silver into one troop type. A balanced army goes further. Save your jade and sapphire for hero upgrades they make a huge difference in their swords.

Keep checking your loot chests. Even common ones can surprise you with useful stuff. And come back often to check if your chests are opened.

title: Squid Race Simulator
description: Run, stop, survive!  Squid Race Simulator brings the iconic Red Light, Green Light game from Squid Game to your screen.  Tap or click to walk, release to stop, and cross the finish line before time runs out.  But be careful!
controls:
On PC:

  • Left Mouse Button / WASD :  Hold to walk
  • Release : Stop

On Mobile:

  • Tap and Hold: Walk
  • Release : Stop
controls_text:
On PC:
Left Mouse Button / WASD :
Hold to walk
Release :
Stop
On Mobile:
Tap and Hold:
Walk
Release :
Stop
howToPlay:
• Wait for the game to start and listen for the Green Light cue.
  • Tap (or click) and hold to walk forward.
  • When you hear Red Light, release immediately to stop moving.
  • If you move after the doll turns, you’re eliminated! Watch the doll closely, not just the sound cues.
  • Cross the finish line before time runs out to reach the next level.
  • Each new level gets harder: faster doll movements, shorter reaction time, and more pressure.
  • Watch the timer at the top! If time runs out, you lose even if the doll didn’t catch you.
howToPlayText:
Wait for the game to start and listen for the Green Light cue.
Tap (or click) and hold to walk forward.
When you hear Red Light, release immediately to stop moving.
If you move after the doll turns, you’re eliminated! Watch the doll closely, not just the sound cues.
Cross the finish line before time runs out to reach the next level.
Each new level gets harder: faster doll movements, shorter reaction time, and more pressure.
Watch the timer at the top! If time runs out, you lose even if the doll didn’t catch you.

title: Tile Match
description:
It’s late afternoon, and the sun is casting a soft golden glow through your little window.  You’ve got your pumpkin spice latte in hand and a cozy plaid blanket draped over your chilly legs.  Your laptop is resting nearby, waiting for you to chill out with something simple yet satisfying. 
You open a tile game on OnlineGames.
howToPlay:
Clear the board by matching tiles in groups of three. But there’s a catch:

  • You have six slots to hold tiles.
  • Once you collect three of the same kind, they disappear.
  • If your slots fill up with unmatched tiles, the game is over.
  • Clearing top layers first makes hidden tiles easier to reach.
  • If you grab a tile too soon, you might run out of matching options. So avoid blocking further moves.

title: Egg Car Racing
description: Egg Car Racing is an online car game where the goal is simple but quirky— keep a fragile egg safe while navigating a bumpy terrain.  This free game will test your driving skills, timing, and ability to stay calm under pressure as you race across 30 challenging levels.  Can you protect the egg through every twist and turn?  Play now and find out!
controls:
For Computers:

  • W or Up Arrow: Jump
  • D or Right Arrow: Move forward
  • A or Left Arrow: Brake / Move backward

For Mobiles:

  • Use on-screen buttons to control jumping, moving forward, and braking.

For Computers:

Jump
D or Right Arrow:
Move forward
A or Left Arrow:
Brake / Move backward

Use on-screen buttons to control jumping, moving forward, and braking.
howToPlay:
• When you first load Egg Car Racing, you'll see a menu with different levels to choose from. Start with the first level to get the hang of the controls and gameplay mechanics.
  • When you start the level, use the right arrow key (or the Move Forward button on mobile) to begin accelerating.
  • Make sure to avoid sudden sharp turns or jerky movements that could cause the egg to drop.
  • As you move forward, you'll encounter hills, bumps, and various obstacles. It's important to maintain control, especially on steep slopes.
  • When going downhill, slow down to avoid the egg falling out due to the car's fast speed. Similarly, go slow when crossing bridges or narrow paths.
  • Press the jump button (W/Up Arrow) at the right moment to clear obstacles such as rocks, trees, or gaps in the road.
  • Be careful when landing, as excessive speed after jumping may cause the egg to break.
  • Sometimes, the car may tilt due to uneven ground. Try to keep the car balanced and avoid tipping over.
  • The egg may fall out if the car flips, so be sure to control the car's movements carefully.
  • As you progress and complete levels, you'll earn coins. Use these to unlock new vehicles that provide better protection for the egg.
  • Each vehicle offers different strengths, such a...

title: Deer Hunter
description: Deer Hunter is a 2D shooting game where you play as a skilled deer huntsman.  Using your sniper skills, you must shoot all the deer on the grass field.  You must aim well and make precise shootings as you have a few ammo.  As you level up, the number of deer will increase.

  • Left click to shoot

Right click to aim
Left click to shoot
howToPlay:
You will see happy deer grazing on the grass in the forest area. You will be waiting with your sniper at a distance. When you find the appropriate moment, do not miss the chance to shoot them. If you miss shooting them in the first place, it will be more challenging to try to shoot them again. The sound of the sniper will make the animals uncomfortable, and they will start to run. Try to shoot them using just one bullet for each animal!

  • You can view how many deer you must shoot from the sight icon in the upper section of the screen.
  • Look for your bullet’s number from the bullet icon near the sight.

title: Nova Craft
description: We're taking you back a billion years to the dawn of creation.  Armed with only four basic elements—fire, water, earth, and air.  You'll start the Big Bang from scratch.  In this alchemy game, combine elements to create new ones and see history unfold.
controls:
Nova Craft features one-handed gameplay with mouse-only controls:

  • Click and drag: Move elements around the board.
  • Combine elements: Drop one item on top of another to create something new.
  • Right-click: Remove unwanted items from the board.
controls_text:

Drop one item on top of another to create something new.

howToPlay:
• Start with just the four elements: fire, water, earth, and air.
  • Experiment by combining any two elements to see what they create. Mixing earth and water might create mud, a swamp, or even life!
  • With over 3,200 items to discover, each combination opens a door to something new. You can watch your collection grow in the library on the left side of your screen.
  • Organize your library with sorting options like name, date, or icon, or use the search bar to quickly find items.
  • The fun lies in experimenting with elements finding unique objects at your own pace.
  • Your progress will be saved in your browser cache, but another option is to download your progress in the settings menu.

description: Looking for the coolest, most chaotic online racing game?  Play Survival Karts on gamecorner.space!  It's a survival showdown on an icy, hole-riddled track!

howToPlay:
• Choose your game mode and get ready to race! Compete with friends in private rooms or join public matches to make new rivals.
  • Once you hit start, the round begins in just a few seconds. When the match starts, all players will dash to the center of the arena at full speed. Race to collect boosters and coins before your opponents can grab them!
  • Each kart leaves colorful skid marks that temporarily erase parts of the ground, creating holes. You'll need to avoid these holes—whether they're made by you or others.
  • As the gaps grow wider and the arena shrinks, the challenge intensifies, and more players tumble into the abyss.
  • If you fall in a hole, you're out! Keep moving, dodging, and jumping to stay in the game.
  • Stay sharp, dodge the hazards, and outlast your competitors. Be the last kart standing to claim victory and earn XP to level up!

description: There is a wedding coming up.  Wedding preparations have already started.  The organization team has been working well.  Now it is the wedding day.
controls: Wedding Dress Salon is a straightforward game to play. There are no complicated rules. All you need is your computer mouse. While playing the game, press the next button when you complete each stage to move on to the next step. If you want to change your decision, you can click the back button. Then, you will come back to the previous stage and rearrange it.

Pick the one that appeals most to you from this plate, then finish applying the makeup. Our preferred eyeshadow color is smokey. After eye shadowing, it is time to select lipstick. Use the one that complements the Bride's lip color the best. The blushes then have peach or pink hues to choose from. However, make sure it works with the lipstick. Glitter is an additional option to blush. Consider aesthetics while choosing eye color and brow shape.
  • Hair: It is time to talk about hair now. Decide the bride's hairstyle and color here. You can give hair a second color layer if you'd like. Select the earrings and necklace the Bride will wear after getting the hair done. The making of jewelry is also finished.

description:
Drive on the Streets of Long Island in the 60's  
Fancy of retro cars and surroundings?  Want to take a ride with a classic car?  Try 2 Player Crazy Racer, a fantastic 3D racing game that you can play with your friend using a single keyboard.  Be the winner of the race, gather the coins and unlock your dream vintage car.
controls:
Player 1 Controls:

  • WASD: Move Car
  • Left-Shift: Speed Up
  • R: Respawn

Player 2 Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move Car
  • M: Speed Up

R: Respawn

Arrow Keys: Move Car

howToPlay:
• Start with choosing the game mode. You have single-player and two-player options. 
  • Select between iconic classic cars from the garage.
  • You can select the same car as your friend. You can distinguish your cars by their colors. 1st player takes the orange while the second gets the blue car.
  • Pick a level and hit the start button.
  • Use arrow keys and WASD to control your cars. 
  • Make use of boosts when you need to make stunts and jumps on this crazy road. To boost the speed, press left shift (1st player) or M key (2nd player).
  • You can hit a tree, sign or fall down the road. And it doesn't have to be the end of the race for you. Just respawn by pressing the R or L key and continue where you left off.

Start with choosing the game mode. You have single-player and two-player options.

Pick a level and hit the start button.
Use arrow keys and WASD to control your cars.
Make use of boosts when you need to make stunts and jumps on this crazy road. To boost the speed, press left shift (1st player) or M key (2nd player).
You can hit a tree, sign or fall down the road. And it doesn't have to be the end of the race for you. Just respawn by pressing the R or L key and continue where you left off.

title: Airplane Racer
description: Fly through the arcades with Airplane Racer!  Airplane Racer is a vivid plane game you can play solo or with a friend.  While solo mode makes you wander the sky alone, versus mode enables you to race with a friend.  In this game, you have many options, like game modes, track options, and airplane alternatives.
howToPlay:
Player 1- Solo 

  • Use the Arrow keys to direct the plane.
  • Activate booster using X. 
  • N can be used for changing the camera view.
  • Activate power up by the Space.

2 Players-Versus

  • Use WASD keys to direct the plane.
  • Activate booster using H.
  • Y can be used for changing the camera view.
  • Activate power up by J.

Also, you can make the game more fun by using your joystick. In the Settings > Inputs menu, you can adjust your settings by your own choice.

Activate booster using X.
N can be used for changing the camera view.
Activate power up by the Space.
2 Players-Versus
Use WASD keys to direct the plane.
Activate booster using H.
Y can be used for changing the camera view.
Activate power up by J.
Also, you can make the game more fun by using your joystick. In the Settings > Inputs menu, you can adjust your settings by your own choice.

title: Rome Simulator
description: How often do you think about the Roman Empire?  The answer is every day for most men.  It is interesting that such a historic figure lingers in our minds after centuries.  While we leave this analysis to the experts, we're excited to present a great game for Roman Empire enthusiasts.

title: Army Combat
description: Whether you prefer defending or attacking, you can do both here!  Army Combat is a 3D action game where you will engage with many trained soldiers.  They are not like amateur fighters.  They go all the way.
controls:
• WASD or Arrow Keys: Move
  • Left-Click: Fire
  • Right-Click: Aim
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • 1-6 Number Keys/Scroll Wheel: Switch Weapons
  • Tab: Pause
  • CTRL: Lean
  • Left-Shift: Run
controls_text:
WASD or Arrow Keys: Move
Left-Click: Fire
Right-Click: Aim
Spacebar: Jump
1-6 Number Keys/Scroll Wheel: Switch Weapons
Tab: Pause
CTRL: Lean
Left-Shift: Run
howToPlay:
• The first thing to do is to determine whether you want to be the defender or the attacker.
  • Make your selections from the main menu as you wish. You can also set the volume and mouse sensibility here.
  • You will be alone on the battlefield. So, you must calculate every movement. Since there will be no one to watch your back.
  • Moreover, your opponents are highly trained. They can be merciless. Try to eliminate all of them one by one by moving strategically. The more you eliminate, the higher the score you get!
  • And for your information, if you go to the whitish areas, you will soon lose your life in the Defend mode. Try to stay in colored areas.

And for your information, if you go to the whitish areas, you will soon lose your life in the Defend mode. Try to stay in colored areas.

The only thing you have is a warhorse that is loyal to you.

Limousine Simulator is a 2D driving game with 25 levels where you experience being a limo driver.  Become a private chauffeur and give your passengers a comfortable ride.  Park the limo smoothly and get generous tips. 
From the Red Carpet to Stretch Limo
Passengers are waiting for you to arrive at their destination.

title: Crazy Moto Racing
description: Crazy Moto Racing is an online 3D motorcycle racing game that puts your speed and skill to the test.  You might think that speed is your buddy here.  But let me assure you; control is your actual buddy.  You can enjoy competing against rivals or racing against time.
controls:
• Arrow keys / WASD: Steer your bike
  • Spacebar: Brake
  • Shift: Activate Nitro boost
controls_text:
Arrow keys / WASD:
Steer your bike
Spacebar:
Brake
Shift:
Activate Nitro boost
howToPlay:
• Select between Race Mode or Time Attack Mode.
  • In race mode, compete against two rivals and aim for first place. The better your finish, the more coins you earn!
  • In Time Attack mode, race against the clock! Avoid cutting corners in Time Attack Mode to prevent penalty time.
  • Using nitro at the right moment can be the difference between first and second place.
  • With ten different courses, each offering unique twists and turns, precision and strategy are key to winning.
  • Use earned coins to buy two additional motorcycles for better speed and handling. The first bike costs 300 coins, and the best bike costs 2700 coins.
  • Complete various achievements like winning races, setting records, and unlocking all bikes.
howToPlayText:
Select between Race Mode or Time Attack Mode.
In race mode, compete against two rivals and aim for first place. The better your finish, the more coins you earn!
In Time Attack mode, race against the clock! Avoid cutting corners in Time Attack Mode to prevent penalty time.
Using nitro at the right moment can be the difference between first and second place.
With ten different courses, each offering unique twists and turns, precision and strategy are key to winning.
Use earned coins to buy two additional motorcycles for better speed and handling. The first bike costs 300 coins, and the best bike costs 2700 coins.
Complete various achievements like winning races, setting records, and unlocking all bikes.

title: Geometry Escape
description: Geometry Escape is an excellent choice for gamers looking for a skill game challenge, especially if you enjoy fast-paced platformers similar to Geometry Dash.  It's an online platformer game where you guide a cube on an obstacle course.  The cube moves automatically at a certain speed, and you'll control the jumps and flights to avoid obstacles on your path.  In this, you will need right-in-time jumps and quick reflexes.
controls:
• Computers: Press or hold the spacebar or left-click to jump and fly.
  • Mobile: Tap and hold the screen to jump and fly.
controls_text:
Computers:
Press or hold the spacebar or left-click to jump and fly.
Mobile:
Tap and hold the screen to jump and fly.
howToPlay:
• Your cube moves forward automatically. Your role is to control the vertical movement. Stay alert. The game doesn't wait for you, so quick reactions to changing environments are essential.
  • Avoid obstacles like spikes, pits and chainsaws. Time your jumps to avoid these.
  • Practice levels to understand the rhythm of obstacles.
  • Each level might introduce new mechanics or combine them in unique ways. Adaptability is crucial.
  • In rocket sections, hold to fly through narrow corridors, dodging obstacles.
  • The game flips the gravity on some levels, requiring you to adapt your jumping strategy.
  • Speed Boosts will increase your speed, making timing even more critical.
  • Collect coins to customize your skin, rocket and more. 30 levels with increasing difficulty are waiting to be conquered! Have fun dashing!
howToPlayText:
Your cube moves forward automatically. Your role is to control the vertical movement. Stay alert. The game doesn't wait for you, so quick reactions to changing environments are essential.
Avoid obstacles like spikes, pits and chainsaws. Time your jumps to avoid these.

title: Fun Party Makeup
description: Birthday or bachelorette?  Engagement or baby shower?  For all kinds of occasions, we have a fun party make-up game.  You can glorify the looks and exaggerate the spark as much as you want because it's supposed to be fun.

• Use your cursor or touchscreen to pick items
  • Press arrow buttons to navigate

Press arrow buttons to navigate
howToPlay:
In the Fun Party Makeup game, you get to be a skin care specialist, hairdresser, makeup artist and personal fashion advisor—all four in one. Only one person in the world can accomplish these four distinct jobs simultaneously, and that's a best friend. 

  • Four gorgeous girls are waiting for you, the skilled BFF, to prepare each of them uniquely.
  • Start with skin care. Clean and peel off the dirt from the skin with a clay mask. 
  • Put on some aloe gel to soothe it out, and hydrate with moisturizer until the girls' skins glow naturally. 
  • When the skincare is complete, a face is ready for a makeup extravaganza.
  • You will have access to a set of makeup supplies such as lipstick, eyeshadow, blush, and mascara. 
  • You can also choose eye colors, eyebrow shapes and hairstyles.

title: Skibidi Toilet io
description: Have you ever heard of a game called Skibidi Toilet io?  It's a rather absurd concept - a battle royale game where toilets run around like crazy.  The aim of the game is for the toilets to compete with each other by eating as much toilet paper and hot peppers as possible.  As they consume more, they become bigger and stronger.

title: Urban Sniper
description: Urban Sniper is an online shooting game with straightforward controls and 3D mechanics.  As a sniper on duty, you will be given certain tasks on eliminating thieves, snatchers, terrorists, and mafia lords.  Take your position and kill them before they escape.  Save the city and be an urban hero.
controls:
Urban Sniper is an online shooting game with straightforward controls and 3D mechanics. As a sniper on duty, you will be given certain tasks on eliminating thieves, snatchers, terrorists, and mafia lords. Take your position and kill them before they escape. Save the city and be an urban hero. Refrain from harming any civilians, as it will result in the immediate termination of your duty. Consider investing in better-quality weapons as you progress through levels and gain more experience and coins. There are 21 levels in Urban Sniper, starting off easy for you to settle into your position. However, the game will become more challenging as you deal with career criminals.

title: Mahjong
description: Mahjong Online is a game of patience, skill, and a bit of luck.  In this version of a decades-old game, your goal will be to match identical tiles to remove them from the board until none remain.  The difficulty comes with this rule: only free tiles can be picked.  So, blocked tiles must be open on at least one side.

title: Speed Drift Racing
description:
Speed Drift Racing is a free online racing game for arcade game lovers.  In a simplistic 2D setting with 3 opponents ahead of you, you will drift through sharp bends and make cool maneuvers to arrive at the finish line first. 
Get ready to test your skills on the slippery roads of Speed Drift Racing!  This online car game is all about mastering the art of precision drifting.
controls:
Computers

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to control the car. 

Mobiles

  • Steer: Tap arrow buttons on left bottom of your screen
  • Speed/Slow Down: Tap and hold the gas and brake pedals on right bottom of your screen
controls_text:
Computers
Use WASD or arrow keys to control the car.
Mobiles
Steer: Tap arrow buttons on left bottom of your screen
Speed/Slow Down: Tap and hold the gas and brake pedals on right bottom of your screen
howToPlay:
• Start with the first level and complete the 2 laps before other cars.
  • Use arrow keys to control the car.
  • Pay close attention to the bends, as these cars are designed to drift in a crazy way.
  • If you hit an object, you can still continue racing, but it's better to hurry up even more!
  • Each level completion will bring you 250 coins, plus you'll get bonus coins based on where you completed the race. Keep racing to unlock more rewards!
  • There are 20 levels with increasing difficulty. Finish them all!

title: American Touchdown
description: American Touchdown is a 2 player ball game where you try to carry the ball to the opponent's side.  If the ball is in your opponent's hand, you need to carefully approach him and take it from his hand.  Of course, your hands must be in a suitable position to receive the ball.  This match will be fascinating!
controls:
1 Player

  • Use the A, D and W keys to move the character.

2 Player

  • Use the left, right and upper arrow keys to move the second character.
controls_text:
1 Player
Use the A, D and W keys to move the character.
2 Player
Use the left, right and upper arrow keys to move the second character.
howToPlay: Take the ball in your hand and move towards the other side's goal. Your character's arms will be moving automatically. Therefore, when it is in your opponent's hands, in order to receive it, approach the ball carefully and make sure your arms are in a suitable position. Skillfully maneuver your character's automatic moves and get the scores!

Therefore, when it is in your opponent's hands, in order to receive it, approach the ball carefully and make sure your arms are in a suitable position. title: Crazy Karts
description:
Did you know that most Formula 1 drivers started their careers with Karting?  These tiny four-wheeled machines can reach speeds of up to 100 mph.  
Even though karting is an adrenaline-pumping experience as you drive a lightweight vehicle on a crazy circuit, drivers are open to many safety risks.  That's why we bring this experience to the virtual realm.

  • Fire: Spacebar

title: Dinosaur Game
description: Do you remember the T-Rex in Google Chrome when your internet connection went out?  Now, you can play it online, too.  Dinosaur Game is a free-running game where there is no finish line.  We warn you in advance that this is a challenging game.
controls:
The game controls are straightforward, as are the graphics of the game. There is nothing that makes your job difficult. 

  • Use the W, Upper Arrow, or Spacebar keys to jump. Additionally, you can use your mouse click. Whichever you want to use.
  • Tap to jump in your tablet and smartphone.
controls_text:
The game controls are straightforward, as are the graphics of the game. There is nothing that makes your job difficult.
Use the W, Upper Arrow, or Spacebar keys to jump. Additionally, you can use your mouse click. Whichever you want to use.
Tap to jump in your tablet and smartphone.
howToPlay:
As you can see from the graphics, Dinosaur Game is a very simple but enjoyable game. You will start running as a T-rex. From time to time, the T-rex's speed will increase, and sometimes it will decrease. The competition aims to avoid thorny plants as much as possible by adapting to these sudden changes in speed. If you touch any of these plants, you will be burned. When the speed rate increases or decreases, you can see the warning message in capital letters on the screen. No matter how easy the game itself seems, you will experience firsthand that it is not! If you have an internet connection, the game will open. The internet does not necessarily have to be disconnected.

  • Open your web browser and search for OnlineGames.io
  • Enter the OnlineGames.io
  • Search Dinosaur Run in the search field in the upper right corner of the site
  • Open the game and tap to start to begin running

title: Offroad Rally
description: This will be a bit of a muddy race!  Prepare yourself for this!  Offroad Rally is a 3D racing game where you race on an off-road racetrack full of bumps with driftwood and mud.  Your ability to maneuver against these obstacles will be tested.
controls:

If you don't know these things, even if you drive the fastest car, it's in vain. Overcome obstacles and be the first to reach the finish line.

title: Monster Truck Booster
description:
Monster Truck Booster is here to take your gaming experience to new heights—literally.  This online 2D driving game combines classic monster truck mechanics with a quirky twist: a powerful booster that launches your truck into the air.  Whether you're climbing steep slopes or leaping over wild ramps, the challenge is all about precision and flair. 
But what makes this game truly stand out?
controls:
For Computers:

  • Accelerate: Up Arrow or W
  • Reverse: Down Arrow or S
  • Rotate Left: Left Arrow or A
  • Rotate Right: Right Arrow or D
  • Boost: Hold Spacebar to charge and release to launch.

For Mobiles:

  • Accelerate, Reverse, Boost: Tap the buttons on the the screen.
controls_text:
For Computers:
Accelerate:
Up Arrow or W
Reverse:
Down Arrow or S
Rotate Left:
Left Arrow or A
Rotate Right:
Right Arrow or D
Boost:
Hold Spacebar to charge and release to launch.
For Mobiles:
Accelerate, Reverse, Boost:
Tap the buttons on the the screen.
howToPlay: Start by selecting your monster truck and picking a level. The early levels are beginner-friendly, giving you time to get the hang of the mechanics. Use the accelerate and reverse controls to navigate the terrain. From rugged hills to random barriers, each level presents unique challenges. To overcome these obstacles, hold the boost key or button to build power and release it at the perfect moment. Use mid-air rotations to adjust your landing. Complete the level by navigating all obstacles and pulling off mid air flips.

Complete the level by navigating all obstacles and pulling off mid air flips.

title: Fire and Water
description: Fire and Water is a challenging two-player game where you and your mate try to overcome all the obstacles in a temple, as in the most popular web browser game of the 2000s: Fireboy and Watergirl.  It draws inspiration from the beloved game.  Play as Fire and Water and collect all the stars in the game.  For the gamers who finished all the versions of the original Fireboy and Watergirl game series and still hungry for further levels Fire and Water is your cup of tea.
howToPlay:
• There are 30 challenging levels in Fire and Water. Decide which character you will play with and move forward in the temple. 
  • You need to progress according to which character you choose. 
  • On the track, you will see puddles and lava lakes in some places. 
  • Water should not enter the lava lake, and fire should not come into contact with puddles. 
  • Here, each character must act according to their nature. Otherwise, you will be back to your starting point.
howToPlayText:
There are 30 challenging levels in Fire and Water. Decide which character you will play with and move forward in the temple.
You need to progress according to which character you choose.
On the track, you will see puddles and lava lakes in some places.
Water should not enter the lava lake, and fire should not come into contact with puddles.
Here, each character must act according to their nature. Otherwise, you will be back to your starting point.

description: Let's test how long you can withstand the attack waves. Here, you will progress step by step and focus on a different map at each level.  Build your towers and protect your lands!
controls:

Use your strategic skills to plant your towers at the critical points of the map and position yourself for attacks. You can get help from 12 different heroes, each with different abilities, and fight side by side. They are compelling and ready to protect the land at any cost against any threat!

After choosing the level you will play, you can decide the details of the game. First, you need to select the heroes you will play with. Choose one of the heroes on the right, at most three. You can start the game by finally determining the difficulty level of the game.

If you fall, you’ll need to start a new journey with another warrior. If you win, you get to upgrade your gladiator for the next match.

This business endeavor will necessitate a complete start from scratch.  You must, therefore, exercise patience while the company expands.  You'll be glad to see the success of your startup in time!

Creating an app is where you'll start. In the future, you will be able to unlock more tiers as you produce code and make money. Bringing on new employees will significantly improve your task.

description:
Survival Craft is a sandbox game where the player crafts tools such as an axe and a shovel, weapons and even wearables in order to survive in the jungle.  Gather the necessary materials to craft any item. 
Do not forget to construct buildings for yourself to take shelter.  Create an environment for yourself where you can survive under the harsh conditions of raw nature!

  • Use your mouse to craft items.
  • Use the right mouse click to equip, drop, or eat an item or sow seeds.

• You will find yourself with nothing in your pocket in an open world.
  • In the forest, you can find oak trees, pine trees, rocks, flying birds, and lakes for fishing.

title: Geometry Rash
description: The little square loves to dance!  Dangerous obstacles keep coming on his way.  Follow the rhythm, let him jump over the obstacles, and keep him out of trouble!  It may sound simple, but Geometry Rash is a 2D action platformer game requiring very fast response.
controls: • Use left-click, spacebar, W or up arrow key to jump.
controls_text: Use left-click, spacebar, W or up arrow key to jump.
howToPlay:
• The dash immediately starts after you hit the play button, launching the little square into action. So get your fingertips ready.
  • You can use space, W, up arrow or left-click to jump. All these keys will do the same work.
  • You need to jump over triangles; any collision with them will bring you back to the starting point.
  • You can jump on flat surfaces, but do not hit them on the side.
  • Collect stars on your way, and always keep an eye on the right to see what obstacles are coming along.
  • The game will be more challenging as you progres. You will face different kinds of obstacles and a higher speed run.
  • Give yourself some time to adjust to Geometry Rash since your first ride may not go as you expected. After a couple of trials, most players start to run better and enjoy the game.

But remember that you need to go right over the pink halos. You can not miss any of them.

title: Draw the Car Path
description: Draw the Car Path is an online puzzle game where you guide cars to their parking spots by drawing their paths.  It sounds simple, but as you progress, the difficulty of solving the tangled cars increases.  You'll start with a single car in an empty parking lot, but soon, you'll have to manage multiple vehicles, all while making sure they don’t crash into each other or the walls.  With 30 levels to complete, strategic thinking and precise drawing skills will be your best buddies!
controls:
For Computers:

  • Click on the car and drag to draw a path for each car.

For Mobiles:

  • Tap and drag to draw a path for the car.
controls_text:
For Computers:
Click on the car and drag to draw a path for each car.
For Mobiles:
Tap and drag to draw a path for the car.
howToPlay:
• Click or tap on a car and drag to draw a path leading to its designated parking spot. The drawing lines' color will match with the car's color.
  • As levels progress, more cars appear. Plan carefully to prevent crashes.
  • Cars shouldn’t crash into each other or walls. Adjust paths and draw smoother curves if needed.
  • Some levels have obstacles, so use open spaces wisely.
  • Try to collect all three stars on the level by drawing the path over the stars.
  • Sometimes, cars need to be parked in a specific direction. Pay attention to the arrows on the parking spot.
  • Once satisfied with your paths, hit the play button on the top right, start the movement and see if your plan works.

title: Moto Trials
description: Moto Trials is a 3D driving game where players try to engage with the ramps and obstacles on the platform.  Here, the player's ability to control the motor will be tested to the utmost. Enter the world of Moto Trials, where thrilling challenges and an adrenaline rush are waiting for you. With every new level, the ever-changing platform will push you to the limit and present you with nerve-wracking ramps and hazards that will have you on the tip of your seat.

title: Shortcut Race
description: Shortcut Race is a 3D running game where the one who cheats the most wins the race.  We know it is not fair, but also fun!  You will race with wacky characters on a twisted road on the water.  Collect the planks on your way and build shortcuts to get ahead of your rivals.
howToPlay:
• Take your position behind the opponents. The race starts soon.
  • Tap on the 'Play' button to start. Move your mouse or use left and right buttons to navigate.
  • Race on the water to reach the finish line without falling into the water.
  • Collect as many planks as possible on this jagged track.
  • With the planks you collected, you will craft a shortcut bridge on the water to go off the usual track.
  • Using planks is not the only way to create shortcuts. You can also jump to islands to get ahead.
  • When you reach the finish line safe and sound, you will enter another round to multiply your earnings from this race. Use the leftover planks to track along the highest-numbered islands.
  • Use your coins to buy shiny and colorful planks or a new skin.

  • Dress Up: In the last part, make her wear a magnificent dress and complement it with a cloak! Make the witch put her fearful cloak on. And, of course, the hat! There is no witch without a witch hat. She is ready now for the party!

title: Snake Wars
description: Snake Wars is a fun io game where you embody a cute snake trying to get bigger by eating food.  You must be the biggest one among the others in the pit.  Otherwise, you will become prey for them.  Avoid crashing with any other ones to achieve success in this thrilling snake game!
controls:
• Mouse: Steer
  • Left-Click/Space Key: Boost
  • Mobile Controls: Tap and drag

Steer

howToPlay: All you need to do in the io game is eat food and get bigger. The more you eat, the more you grow! It is very simple. Your score is equal to your size. To get the highest score and get on top of the leaderboard at the upper right side of the screen, avoid getting crashing with others. You have 2 minutes and 30 seconds. Take up as much food as you can within this short period.

title: Soul Essence Adventure
description: Soul Essence Adventure is a 2D adventure game where you are stuck in a dark and gloomy castle and try to get out.  You will encounter many enemies while trying to get out of this castle.  They will try to harm you.  You need to prepare yourself for all kinds of attacks and obstacles.

  • E key to interact.
  • Tab key to open the inventory.

You can also improve your character's skills from the inventory section.

title: First Day of School
description:
After a long holiday, the first day of school has arrived.  Let's see how you will prepare the girls for this day.  
First Day of School is a 2D fashion game where you're that stylist who gets the girls ready for the first day of school.  They are overly confident in you and your taste.

The girls are both a little stressed about the first day of school and very excited to meet their friends. They want to make a good impression on this day because they will also meet their new friends.

It's up to you to prepare them carefully for the day. They knocked on the door of the beauty salon, trusting your stylist's personality, make-up skills and fashion vision.

title: Idle Restaurant
description: How does the idea of ​​running a restaurant sound to you?  Idle Restaurant is an idle game where you operate a restaurant starting from the basics.  Starting from scratch is never easy.  But growing your restaurant is possible if you know how to manage well and take the proper steps.
controls: • Click and drag the mouse over the necessary places to perform. Press and hold the screen while navigating up and down to see the upper working portions after unlocking numerous floors.

That's why working with managers will be of great benefit to you.

Mad Doctor is a crazy game where you try to mess with a virtual crazy doctor by using types of weapons, scalpels, and some medical chemicals.  You can make the doctor even madder with anything that can be found in a hospital.

title: War Simulator
description:
A medieval war strategist commanding an army of diverse units such as archers, spearmen, and dwarves - that's who you get to be on War Simulator!  Deploy your warriors with a strategic formation and conquer new lands in this online game!  Use your wits to outmaneuver your enemies and secure victory! 
Controls

Left Click to place warriors on the battlefield.

• LeftClick to place warriors on the battlefield.

Left
Click to place warriors on the battlefield.
Hold right click to look around
Scroll to zoom in/out to the scene
howToPlay:
• War Simulator features 10 challenging levels, with 4 set in dense forests and the remaining 6 in deserts.
  • Each level presents unique terrain and enemy formations, requiring careful analysis and strategic planning.
  • Position your warriors wisely, utilizing the terrain to your advantage.
  • Once your units are in place, click the "Start Battle" button to watch the battle unfold in real-time.
  • You can also speed up the action to 1.5X or 2X to see the outcome sooner.

title: Head Soccer Football

Step right up to Head Soccer Football, where all the soccer legends come together to compete!  Whether you're a fan of Ronaldo, Zidane, Pele, Messi or Maradona, you'll find your favorite soccer player waiting for you here.  But don't be surprised if they look somehow different than usual because these guys are the little versions (but big heads) of famous football players. 
Your goal is to head the ball directly into the net.

description: Kingdom Attack offers a fascinating game world where many different creatures live.  Employ spirited knights, witches and archers in your army.  Upgrade your towers to their most potent.  Then, get ready to defend your kingdom from zombies, dragons, and other shapeless creatures on the battlefield.

title: Formula 1 Driver
description:
Would you like to kick off some dust here?  Formula 1 Driver is a 2D driving game where all the race spectators' eyes are on you while driving an F1 vehicle.  Collect all the coins you encounter along the way and reach the finish line without flipping your F1 vehicle.

• You are in the driver's seat of one of the most magnificent Formula 1 vehicles.
